pages.text: wo chahte hai ke Allah ke noor ko apne muh se bujade aur Allah tala inkari hai magar osi bath ka ke apna noor pora kare go kafir na khush rahe
osi ne apne rasol ko hidayath aur sacche deen ke sath bheja hai ke ose aur tamam mazhabo par ghalib karde,agar che mushrik bora mane

ae iman walo! aksar ulema aur aabedh, logo ka mal nahaq kha jate hai aur Allah ki rah se ruk dete hai aur jo log sune chandi ka khazana rakhte hai aur Allah ki rah mein qarch nahi karte unhe dardnak azaab ki qabar pahocha dijiye

jis din us khazane ko atishe dozakh mein tapaya jaega phir us se un ki peshaniya aur pehlo pite, daghi jaengi(un se kaha jaega)ye hai jise tum ne apne liye khazana bana kar rakha tha,pus apne khazano ka maza chako

mahino ki ginti Allah ke nazdik kitabullah mein bara ki hai,osi din se jab se asman aur zamin ko us ne paida kiya hai,un mein se char hurmath wa adab ke hai,yahi durust deen hai,tum un mahino mein apni jano par zulm na karo aur tum tamam mushriko se jihad karo jaise ke wo tum sub se ladte hai aur jan rakho ke Allah tala muttaqiyo ke sath hai
